backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining challenge, chat, recording, and user profile types, with authorization, blob storage, invite link integration, and build info queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence verification metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend components, hooks, screens, and utilities.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for dependencies, build outputs, environment files, IDE metadata, logs, and cache directories.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERIFICATION.md: Checklist for confirming a successful deployment, verifying live app availability, and checking version stamping.
frontend/index.css: Thin CSS file forwarding to the main theme stylesheet in src.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file including cache-busting headers and a build-stamped app-version meta tag for version tracking.
frontend/scripts/generateAppVersion.mjs: Build script generating a unique app version, writing it to .env.local and generating a TypeScript module for runtime use.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component coordinating auth, challenge status, routing, version stamping, update guard, and optional DevPanel.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with centered mobile container and migration banner suppression.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: UI overlay indicating the app is updating due to a detected version mismatch.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Component that renders multiline assignment text with bolded step labels and preserved spacing.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Renders a full audio recording UI with start/stop, playback, sharing dialog, upload handling, and error states.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-only authentication control that triggers II login/logout and handles loading states.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems persisted invitation codes, shows loading/error states, and refreshes challenge queries.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Implements challenge chat with message list, sending, editing, replying, polling, and name resolution.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Displays a dismissible alert dialog explaining that a challenge was deleted with scrollable content.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Shows a compact reference preview for a replied-to chat message with sender name resolution.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer diagnostics panel showing auth info, version mismatch checks, and debugging tools.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two info popups using SharedPopup with translated titles, descriptions, and section content.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Displays an array of sections with optional headings and formatted content inside popup bodies.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks children until the user profile has a name, showing a form to enter and save it.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper that shows loading or error UI for a query before rendering children with its data.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Shows an audio level meter with color-coded bar and percentage display based on normalized input.
Audio player with play/pause, time tracking, seeking slider, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper providing consistent layout, scrolling, and trigger behavior for popups.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that switches between light and dark themes using a custom hook.
frontend/src/generated/appVersion.ts: Exports a build version string using Vite env or a runtime-generated fallback when placeholders are detected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a one-time hard refresh when mismatched, with loop prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Hook handling microphone recording, audio analysis, timers, cleanup, and exposing recording controls and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and principal string based on the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge data, recordings, and chat messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Watches the DOM for an unwanted migration banner and hides detected elements using a MutationObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Provides a light/dark theme hook that syncs with localStorage and applies the theme class to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user's challenge status using React Query when an actor and authentication are available.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Implements a simple i18n provider exposing a translation function using the English translation map.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: Empty translation file placeholder for English.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.json: Empty translation file placeholder for Spanish.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full English translation dictionary for the app across multiple screens and UI sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, base styles, and an About button glow effect.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Displays a placeholder screen when no active challenge exists and offers navigation to create a challenge or refresh inconsistent state.
Manages challenge creation and editing, including start dates, invitation codes, participant management, and challenge lifecycle actions.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty file with no implemented content.
Shows a simple challenge overview with state info and an optional edit button.
Main in-challenge interface handling daily assignments, recordings, participant views, chat, and URL‑synced navigation state.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry screen determining whether users should log in, create a challenge, or continue an active one, with theme and auth controls.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utilities for reading, writing, and clearing app navigation state stored in URL parameters.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Utilities for reading, validating, and stamping app version metadata, including fallback logic for placeholder versions.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines five fixed daily assignments for the challenge, each with canonical IDs, titles, and content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches and retrieves backend build info in the frontend and provides a short build identifier.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Persists, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index to produce readable date strings.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Stores, checks, and clears a sessionStorage flag indicating a challenge-deleted notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client-side challenge state, clearing storage and invalidating related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Performs a cache‑busted hard refresh with loop protection and provides utilities to attempt and reset it.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase alphanumeric invitation codes without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists invitation link parameters while preserving navigation state.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts and validates day numbers between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) formats.
Logs recording upload attempts, failures, and successes with minimal diagnostic context.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical assignment IDs and utilities to validate, assert, and normalize recording identifiers.
Provides helpers to extract, classify, and sanitize error messages into safe user-facing text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Checks the running app version against the latest deployed version and indicates if a refresh is needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing deployment issues, existing features, and versioning requirements.
